modules.description: Provides functions to initialize, enumerate, open, and close HID devices, read and write data from endpoints, and retrieve device information. Works with device descriptors, device handles, and binary data buffers. Used to interact with USB HID devices such as game controllers, sensors, and custom hardware.

Initializes and deinitializes the HIDAPI library, enumerates connected HID devices with optional vendor/product ID filtering, and opens device handles by ID or path for reading, writing, and configuring nonblocking behavior. Operates on device handles and device information records, supporting direct interaction with hardware like game controllers, input devices, and custom HID peripherals. Enables low-level communication with USB HID devices, including sending reports and receiving data from specific device paths.
